data.text:
It's been a few days since I've become 
a trainer at Tracen Academy.
data.processed:
<story>It's been a few days since I've become 
<story>a trainer at Tracen Academy.

data.text:
An error occurred. No applicable buildings 
found at the target coordinates.
data.processed:
<story>An error occurred. No applicable buildings 
<story>found at the target coordinates.

data.text:
I spot a lone horse girl standing motionless 
as I walk through the downtown area.
data.processed:
<story>I spot a lone horse girl standing motionless 
<story>as I walk through the downtown area.

data.text:
My device's GPS function also displays an error. 
Returning error code 404.
data.processed:
<story>My device's GPS function also displays an error. 
<story>Returning error code 404.

data.text:
That badge identifies you as a trainer from Tracen Academy. 
Nice to meet you. My name is Mihono Bourbon.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>That badge identifies you as a trainer from Tracen Academy. 
<story>Nice to meet you. My name is Mihono Bourbon.

data.text:
I am currently returning error code 404. 
The newly opened training supplies store could not be found.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I am currently returning error code 404. 
<story>The newly opened training supplies store could not be found.

data.text:
I was told to continue along this street for about 
100 meters, so I did. But I cannot find the store here.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I was told to continue along this street for about 
<story>100 meters, so I did. But I cannot find the store here.

data.text:
Furthermore, my device is now giving me an error 
making it impossible to use the navigation software.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Furthermore, my device is now giving me an error 
<story>making it impossible to use the navigation software.

data.text:
I'm not familiar with the store, but I should be able 
to look it up on my phone for her.

choices.text: I'll see if I can find it.

data.processed:
<story>I'm not familiar with the store, but I should be able 
<story>to look it up on my phone for her.

data.text: Much obliged.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Much obliged.

data.text:
It didn't take long before I found it. 
It says it's about 42 meters from here. 
In fact, looking closely in the distance, I think I see it.

choices.text: It's just a little further along the street.
choices.processed: <size=42>It's just a little further along the street.</size>

choices.text: It's just a little further along the street.
choices.processed: <size=42>It's just a little further along the street.</size>

data.processed:
<story>It didn't take long before I found it. 
<story>It says it's about 42 meters from here. 
<story>In fact, looking closely in the distance, I think I see it.

data.text: Excuse me but... How far is 'a little?'
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Excuse me but... How far is 'a little?'

data.text: I need you to tell me the exact distance of 'a little'.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>I need you to tell me the exact distance of 'a little'.

data.text: Forty...ish?
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Forty...ish?

data.text:
Input parsed. Thank you very much. 42 meters ahead. 
Confirming the discrepancy in the distance.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Input parsed. Thank you very much. 42 meters ahead. 
<story>Confirming the discrepancy in the distance.

data.text:
This was an unexpected lapse in my own research. 
I have logged the error and will work to prevent this issue 
from occurring again in the future.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>This was an unexpected lapse in my own research. 
<story>I have logged the error and will work to prevent this issue 
<story>from occurring again in the future.

data.text: I once again offer you my thanks for your help.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>I once again offer you my thanks for your help.

data.text: Commencing operation: Moving 42 meters ahead.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Commencing operation: Moving 42 meters ahead.

data.text:
I kept her in sight just in case, and she did indeed reach 
the store. She stopped right in front of it and entered the door.
data.processed:
<story>I kept her in sight just in case, and she did indeed reach 
<story>the store. She stopped right in front of it and entered the door.

data.text:
It is the day after I met that peculiar horse girl. 
I went to see a mock race, looking for horse girls 
wanting to be scouted.
data.processed:
<story>It is the day after I met that peculiar horse girl. 
<story>I went to see a mock race, looking for horse girls 
<story>wanting to be scouted.

data.text:
Mihono Bourbon is participating in this race. Didn't she have 
great results even before she entered the academy?
data.name: Rookie Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Mihono Bourbon is participating in this race. Didn't she have 
<story>great results even before she entered the academy?

data.text:
She's a bit like a cyborg though. I've seen her on the grounds 
in person, but her personality's a bit strange...
data.name: Experienced Trainer
data.processed:
<story>She's a bit like a cyborg though. I've seen her on the grounds 
<story>in person, but her personality's a bit strange...

data.text:
The stands are chock-full of other trainers looking to scout. 
We're all looking to snag horse girls who show potential.
data.processed:
<story>The stands are chock-full of other trainers looking to scout. 
<story>We're all looking to snag horse girls who show potential.

data.text: *clang*
data.processed: <story>*clang*

data.text:
With that sound, the gates open. 
The horse girls, all wearing jerseys, fly out at once.
data.processed:
<story>With that sound, the gates open. 
<story>The horse girls, all wearing jerseys, fly out at once.

data.text: The leader's going strong!
data.name: Rookie Trainer
data.processed: <story>The leader's going strong!

data.text:
One horse girl managed to break away from the pack 
right away. It was Mihono Bourbon. 
She leads with quite the distance.
data.processed:
<story>One horse girl managed to break away from the pack 
<story>right away. It was Mihono Bourbon. 
<story>She leads with quite the distance.

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text:
The rumors were right, her speed is truly fascinating. 
The short distance racers are about to face 
an incredibly talented newcomer!
data.name: Experienced Trainer
data.processed:
<story>The rumors were right, her speed is truly fascinating. 
<story>The short distance racers are about to face 
<story>an incredibly talented newcomer!

data.text:
She impresses everyone as she speeds down the 
home stretch with a huge lead over the rest.
data.processed:
<story>She impresses everyone as she speeds down the 
<story>home stretch with a huge lead over the rest.

data.text: *huff huff* Hngh!
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>*huff huff* Hngh!

data.text: She easily takes first place by a landslide.
data.processed: <story>She easily takes first place by a landslide.

data.text:
When I met her downtown the other day, I never 
imagined she'd be so fast. Her ability stole my heart.
data.processed:
<story>When I met her downtown the other day, I never 
<story>imagined she'd be so fast. Her ability stole my heart.

data.text:
She looks very promising! 
I've got to get her before anyone else!
data.name: Rookie Trainer
data.processed:
<story>She looks very promising! 
<story>I've got to get her before anyone else!

data.text: It's no use. It seems she already has a trainer.
data.name: Experienced Trainer
data.processed: <story>It's no use. It seems she already has a trainer.

data.text:
And indeed, when I finally reached her, 
she was talking to another trainer.
data.processed:
<story>And indeed, when I finally reached her, 
<story>she was talking to another trainer.

data.text: He's a veteran trainer apparently. A real hotshot. Maaan, I can't believe I've been outdone like that.
data.name: Rookie Trainer
data.processed: He's a veteran trainer apparently. A real hotshot. Maaan, I can't believe I've been outdone like that.

data.text:
He said he sees great promise in pursuing 
short distance races with her.
data.name: Experienced Trainer
data.processed:
<story>He said he sees great promise in pursuing 
<story>short distance races with her.

data.text:
If she's already found a trainer, then that's it for me. 
I guess I'll just secretly cheer her on from the sidelines 
from now on.
data.processed:
<story>If she's already found a trainer, then that's it for me. 
<story>I guess I'll just secretly cheer her on from the sidelines 
<story>from now on.

data.text:
It's evening and time to head home. I take a stroll 
around the school grounds when suddenly...
data.processed:
<story>It's evening and time to head home. I take a stroll 
<story>around the school grounds when suddenly...

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text:
I spot Mihono Bourbon, who I suspect 
is doing some training by herself.
data.processed:
<story>I spot Mihono Bourbon, who I suspect 
<story>is doing some training by herself.

data.text:
*huff huff* 1800 meters reached. 1200 meters remaining. 
Time elapsed: 2:04. Severely behind target pace.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>*huff huff* 1800 meters reached. 1200 meters remaining. 
<story>Time elapsed: 2:04. Severely behind target pace.

data.text:
Is she timing herself? And, wait... 
Did I hear that right?
data.processed:
<story>Is she timing herself? And, wait... 
<story>Did I hear that right?

data.text:
Normally you shouldn't let a horse girl 
run this distance right after her debut. 
Her body isn't ready for it yet.
data.processed:
<story>Normally you shouldn't let a horse girl 
<story>run this distance right after her debut. 
<story>Her body isn't ready for it yet.

data.text: Hng!
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Hng!

data.text: *pant pant*
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>*pant pant*

data.text: Ugh...
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Ugh...

data.text:
She just fell over! 
I hurry towards her.
data.processed:
<story>She just fell over! 
<story>I hurry towards her.
